00035 #include "PowerQualityMetric.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"

00038 using namespace Mesquite;

00040 PowerQualityMetric::PowerQualityMetric(QualityMetric* qm,
00041                                        double pow_factor )
00042   : mMetric(*qm), mPower( pow_factor )
00043 {}
00044 
00045 PowerQualityMetric::~PowerQualityMetric() {}
00046 
00047 std::string PowerQualityMetric::get_name() const
00048 {
00049   return std::string("pow(") + mMetric.get_name() + ")";
00050 }
00051 
00052 int PowerQualityMetric::get_negate_flag() const
00053 {
00054   return mPower.value() < 0 ? mMetric.get_negate_flag() : -mMetric.get_negate_flag();
00055 }

00057 void PowerQualityMetric::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd,
00058                                         std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00059                                         bool free_only,
00060                                         MsqError& err )
00061 {
00062   mMetric.get_evaluations( pd, handles, free_only, err ); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool PowerQualityMetric::evaluate( PatchData& pd,
00066                                    size_t handle,
00067                                    double& value,
00068                                    MsqError& err )
00069 {
00070   bool rval = mMetric.evaluate( pd, handle, value, err );
00071   value = mPower.raise(value);
00072   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool PowerQualityMetric::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00076                                                 size_t handle,
00077                                                 double& value,
00078                                                 std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00079                                                 MsqError& err )
00080 {
00081   bool rval = mMetric.evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, value, indices, err );
00082   value = mPower.raise(value);
00083   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 bool PowerQualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00088                                                  size_t handle,
00089                                                  double& value,
00090                                                  std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00091                                                  std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00092                                                  MsqError& err )
00093 {
00094   bool rval = mMetric.evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, err );
00095   const double v = mPower.raise(value);
00096   const double g = fabs(value) > DBL_EPSILON ? mPower.value() * v / value : 0;
00097   value = v;
00098   for (std::vector<Vector3D>::iterator i = gradient.begin(); i != gradient.end(); ++i)
00099     *i *= g;
00100   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00101 }
00102   
00103   
00104 bool PowerQualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00105                                                 size_t handle,
00106                                                 double& value,
00107                                                 std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00108                                                 std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00109                                                 std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00110                                                 MsqError& err )
00111 {
00112   indices.clear();
00113   bool rval = mMetric.evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, Hessian, err );
00114   const double v = mPower.raise(value);
00115   const double g = fabs(value) > DBL_EPSILON ? mPower.value() * v / value : 0.0;
00116   const double h = fabs(value) > DBL_EPSILON ? g * (mPower.value() - 1) / value : 0.0;
00117   value = v;
00118   Matrix3D op;
00119   unsigned idx = 0;
00120   unsigned n = indices.size();
00121   for (unsigned r = 0; r < n; ++r) {
00122     for (unsigned c = r; c < n; ++c) {
00123       Hessian[idx] *= g;
00124       op.outer_product( gradient[r], gradient[c] );
00125       op *= h;
00126       Hessian[idx] += op;
00127       ++idx;
00128     }
00129     gradient[r] *= g;
00130   }
00131   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00132 }
